flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: People want these big screen tvs but can't afford on. Now you can make your own big screen tv foe around $400.00. Big as you want. I saw on msn homepage 152 screen tv 1/2 a million dollars. Check  this out.
guide.title: How to turn your back yard into a drive-in?
